content:
Welcome to #MiHIN Patient Data Query via Ring of FHIR.

Description: Multiple FHIR-PITs interconnected by FHIR client application - “FHIR Station” - to exchange synthetic data with other simulated “edge” organizations (e.g. hospitals, HIEs, health plans, etc.)
Trying to run this query, but getting no results: https://fire-pit.mihin.org/fhirstation/byUrl?querry=Encounter?subject=Practitioner-2178
But I know that patient has an encounter in hie4: https://fire-pit.mihin.org/pit-hie4/baseDstu3/Encounter/Encounter-62912
Figured it out, have to use the full url for the patient reference
